mapper.insert: insert into petservicemenu (name, minPrice, maxPrice, unit, remark, isDiscount, discount, parent_id) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update petservicemenu set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, minPrice = #{minprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, maxPrice = #{maxprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isDiscount = #{isdiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, minPrice, maxPrice, unit, remark, isDiscount, discount, parent_id from petservicemenu
